data.statistics

Class MILStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.statistics.MILStatistics

  • public class MILStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with methods to obtain information about a MIL dataset such as the number of attributes per bag, the average number of instances per bag, and the distribution of number of instances per bag...
    Version:
    20150925
    Author:
    F.J. Gonzalez, Eva Gigaja
